title: PS: Admin Login to Juniper Pulse Secure VPN
description: This Analytic Rule creates Observations for when an Admin logs into Juniper Pulse Secure VPN. Note: Replace object.group.name value as you may.

logObserved.filter: general_information.log_source.type_name = "juniper secure connect" AND general_information.common_event_name = Authentication Success AND object.group.name = "admins"
